keyInstructions.setupInfo:
To use the Brave SDK, you need to obtain an API key (X-Subscription-Token) by subscribing to a plan (including the free plan) at https://brave.com/search/api/.

Once you have your API key, you can use it to initialize the SDK:

```typescript
import { createBraveSDK } from '@microfox/brave';

const braveSDK = createBraveSDK({
  apiKey: 'your-api-key-here',
});
```

Alternatively, you can set the API key as an environment variable:

```
BRAVE_API_KEY=your-api-key-here
```

And then initialize the SDK without passing the API key:

```typescript
const braveSDK = createBraveSDK();
```

The SDK will automatically use the API key from the environment variable if it's not provided in the constructor.

Note: Some endpoints require specific subscription plans (e.g., Pro plan for Local Search, Pro AI plan for Summarizer). Make sure you have the appropriate subscription for the endpoints you intend to use.
